text: long long int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; long long int m [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int findmax ( int a , int b ) { return a > b ? a : b ; } long long int maxsum ( int i , int j , int l ) { if ( m [ i ] [ j ] ) return m [ i ] [ j ] ; if ( i == l - 1 ) return arr [ i ] [ j ] ; else m [ i ] [ j ] = arr [ i ] [ j ] + findmax ( maxsum ( i + 1 , j , l ) , maxsum ( i + 1 , j + 1 , l ) ) ; return m [ i ] [ j ] ; } int main ( ) { long long int sum ; int t , n ; int i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; m [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } sum = maxsum ( 0 , 0 , n ) ; printf ( "%lld\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
